attributes.action: Make all England Football Matches Available to all - Free on Terrestrial TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thanks to Setanta, our national football squad cannot count on the support of our nation during these World Cup Qualifiers.  Money driven deals with Channels such as Setanta etc have discounted the less well off or stubborn from getting behind our national side.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
